data.name: Parrot
data.desc: The Indian Parrot is a great talker that makes them an attractive species of bird.

data.name: Love Birds
data.desc: Lovebirds are small, sociable birds that make excellent pets. They are very social and form deep bonds with their owners.

data.name: Cockatoo
data.desc: Cockatoos are intelligent, playful, and affectionate birds. They are also known for their loud calls and their ability to mimic speech.

data.name: Macaw
data.desc: Macaws are large, colorful parrots that are native to the rainforests of Central and South America. They are known for their vibrant plumage, long tails, and loud voices.

data.name: African Grey
data.desc: African Grey Parrots are highly intelligent birds that are known for their ability to mimic human speech. They are also known for their playful and affectionate nature.
